name: World Vision Brussels & EU Representation ivzw/aisbl
legal: Association Internationale sans but lucratif -  aisbl
goal: A Christian relief, development and advocacy organization dedicated to working with children, families and communities world-wide to reach their full potential by tackling the causes of poverty and injustice, particularly the most vulnerable, working for a world that no longer tolerates poverty.
interests: Agriculture, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Communication, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU Development policies
EU Humanitarian Aid policies
EU child-related policies and funding opportunities
